name: Vampire Lord v1.0
description:
= Story =

Humanity is once again under threat by vampire lord. Harold and his party are trying to chase the evil forces away from the region. Only time will tell if Harold and his party will be succeed.

= Features =

  • 1920 x 1080 resolution
  • A mansion to be bought 
    • Contains top-tier weapons and armors
  • No generic level up system
    • Become more powerful with items
  • Sell enemy item drops to make money
  • No more annoying random encounter
    • Replaced by Enemy detection system
    • Enemy respawn after 5 seconds

= Demo=

This demo has been developed until the first bridge, which means that only two region, forest and dessert region, has been unlocked in the demo. However the dessert region is still under development. Feel free to drop down any comments to help me improve the game!

= Released! =

The game is completely developed. Feel free to drop down any comments to help me improve the game!

= Credits (Plugins) =

  • Atreyo Ray
  • Yanfly Engine Plugins
  • Terrax
